sentences.en: A language teacher should initiate pupils into the elements of grammar.
sentences.cn: 语言老师应该把基本语法教给学生.

sentences.en: Chen was an initiate of a Chinese spiritual discipline.
sentences.cn: 陈是某个中国神学领域的新入门者。

sentences.en: Cracks may initiate in compression, and certainly in tension.
sentences.cn: 裂缝可能在压缩载荷下形成, 当然也可能在拉伸载荷下形成.

sentences.en: Intellectuals have initiated a debate on terrorism.
sentences.cn: 知识分子就恐怖主义发起了辩论。

sentences.en: Neither side would rationally initiate an attack which only result in its own destruction.
sentences.cn: 任何一方只要稍有理性,都不会发动一次结果只能使本身遭到毁灭的袭击.

sentences.en: Respiratory infections may also initiate excerbations.
sentences.cn: 呼吸道感染也可能使病情加重.

sentences.en: Small changes in the gene pool of a population may actually initiate a flush.
sentences.cn: 在种群的基因库中,微小的改变均可实际地诱发一次种群暴长.

sentences.en: Some shooting chains initiate other branching chains.
sentences.cn: 有些枪击链是初始的其它的是分支.

sentences.en: Spontaneous photons initiate stimulated emission and the chain reaction begins.
sentences.cn: 自发发射的光子引起受激发射,开始了链式反应.

sentences.en: The creditors decided ot initiate a bankruptcy proceeding.
sentences.cn: 债权人决定提起破产之诉.

sentences.en: The ensuing drop body temperature will naturally initiate drowsiness and sleep.
sentences.cn: 随之而来的是体内温度下降,自然会导致困倦和睡眠.

sentences.en: The surface has been heated sufficiently to initiate vertical motion.
sentences.cn: 地表加热到足以引起垂直运动.

sentences.en: They have decided to initiate legal proceedings against the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 他们决定向该报提起法律诉讼。

sentences.en: They need to be open to new ideas and willing to initiate within their organization.
sentences.cn: 他们需要对新思想敞开大门,并愿意将其引进他们组织.

sentences.en: They wanted to initiate a discussion on economics.
sentences.cn: 他们想启动一次经济学讨论。

sentences.en: Those kids were initiated into heroin use at a young age.
sentences.cn: 那些孩子很小就被教会如何吸食海洛因。

sentences.en: to initiate legal proceedings against sb
Transmission where the transmission medium does not recognize control characters or initiate any control activity.
sentences.cn: 传输媒介不需要了解控制字符或启动任何控制动作的一种传输方法.

words.tran_cn: 发起人，创始者；教导者；[计] 启动程序；引爆器
开始；新加入者，接受初步知识者
开始，创始；发起；使初步了解

trans.tran_cn: 新加入的；接受初步知识的
新加入某组织（或机构、宗教）的人，新入会的人，被传授初步知识的人
trans.tran_en: someone who has been allowed to join a particular organization, club, or group and has been taught its secrets

trans.tran_cn: 开始，创始；发起；使初步了解
trans.tran_en: to arrange for something important to start, such as an official process or a new plan

trans.tran_cn: 开始，发起，传授，创始，开辟，接纳新成员
trans.tran_en: to arrange for something important to start, such as an official process or a new plan
